title: Merge Duplicate Customer Accounts
description: A customer service agent discovers a customer has two online accounts (e.g., one with a typo in the email). The accounts need to be merged.

tasks.description: Identify the two duplicate accounts in the customer management system.
tasks.expected_outcome: The agent confirms both accounts belong to the same person.

tasks.description: Select the primary account to keep and the secondary account to be merged.
tasks.expected_outcome: The agent chooses the account with the correct email as the primary.

tasks.description: Initiate the account merge, which combines the order history and loyalty points into the primary account.
tasks.expected_outcome: The customer now has a single, unified account with all their historical data.
